customer.title: How Airbnb leverages Stellar X to onboard new hosts
customer.author: Becky Taylor

content.intro: Airbnb is an American San Francisco-based company operating an online marketplace for short- and long-term homestays and experiences. The company acts as a broker and charges a commission from each booking. The company was founded in 2008 by Brian Chesky, Nathan Blecharczyk, and Joe Gebbia. Airbnb is a shortened version of its original name, AirBedandBreakfast.com. Airbnb is the most well-known company for short-term housing rentals.
content.regulation: Regulation of short-term rentals can include requirements for hosts to have business licenses, payment of hotel taxes and compliance with building, city and zoning standards. The hotel industry has lobbied for stricter regulations on short-term home rental and in addition to government-imposed restrictions, many homeowner associations also limit short term rentals.
content.whyTitle: Why do Airbnb need web governance policies?
content.ceoQuote: Brian Chesky, Co-Founder and CEO at Airbnb:
content.reflection: Through spending twenty years working with hots, Airbnb reflected that a lack of governance policy is a systemic issue with most short rentals. Without web governance, hosts usually experience a lack of process and accountability leading to:
content.list1: An organic sprawl of content, creating bloated websites
content.list3: Weak user experience impacting the ability to support digital goals
content.riskWarning: When these problems become acute enough, large website redesign projects begin. But without governance being put in place at the same time, the same problem will only happen again. Airbnb mitigate this risk by baking web governance into their working process with clients from strategy through to site launch and beyond.
content.governanceTitle: Good governance leads to stronger results
content.governanceText: With a strong process for content governance, the benefits are clear for both Airbnb as a company and their clients. Since its founding in 2008, Airbnb has become one of the most successful and valuable start-ups in the world, and has had a significant impact on the industry of renting homes and the hospitality industry more generally.
content.quote: With a strong process for content governance, the benefits are clear for both Airbnb as a company and their clients. Since its founding in 2008, Airbnb has become one of the most successful and valuable start-ups in the world, and has had a significant impact on the industry of renting homes and the hospitality industry more generally.
content.impact: Airbnb has also had a significant impact on the hospitality industry, particularly in the area of hotels and other traditional accommodation providers, which are often referred to as the HORECA industry. Some industry experts believe that Airbnb's rapid growth has disrupted the traditional HORECA model, and has led to a decline in revenue and occupancy rates for traditional hotels in certain markets.
content.buyInTitle: How do you get organisation wide buy-in?
content.buyInText: Mike reflected that the optimum time to introduce a web governance policy is during a website relaunch project because of the collective energy focused on creating a better user experience. Voltaire recommends starting governance policy in line with strategy kick-off.

cta.title: Begin Your Smart Travel Journey
cta.description: Smart Travel Star Journey, as a travel platform favored by the younger generation in China, has become an indispensable 'travel companion' for countless travelers. It gathers massive information and rich resources, dedicated to creating unique and wonderful journeys for everyone with travel dreams.

features04.title: Why Choose Us?
features04.description: As a travel platform favored by the younger generation in China, Smart Travel Star Journey has become an indispensable 'travel companion' for countless travelers. It gathers massive information and rich resources, dedicated to creating unique and wonderful journeys for everyone with travel dreams.

feature1.title: Community Exchange
feature1.description: Share experiences with global travel enthusiasts, get first-hand travel advice and inspiration to create your perfect journey.

feature2.title: Team Views
feature2.description: Collaborate on travel planning with real-time itinerary synchronization, making group travel more convenient and efficient.

feature3.title: Powerful Search
feature3.description: Smart algorithm recommendations to quickly find destinations, accommodations, and activities that match your budget and preferences.

feature1.title: Data Analysis
feature1.description: Personalized recommendations based on your travel history and preferences, ensuring each trip exceeds expectations.

feature2.title: Real-time Notifications
feature2.description: Timely updates on flight changes, weather alerts, and special offers to ensure your travel goes smoothly.

feature3.title: Multi-platform Integration
feature3.description: Seamless connection with major travel service platforms for one-stop booking, payment, and itinerary management.

feature1.title: Privacy Protection
feature1.description: Strict data encryption and privacy policies to ensure your personal information and travel plans are secure.

feature2.title: Data Export
feature2.description: Export your travel plans and booking information anytime, supporting multiple formats for offline viewing and sharing.

feature3.title: Real-time Sync
feature3.description: Synchronize your travel data across multiple devices in real-time, manage and update your travel plans anywhere, anytime.
